item.title: MyBlog
item.description: Hi! My name is Andres. Thank you for visiting this blog on github. I started this blog to post technical blogs about different in systems administration, networking, cloud computing, computer science and to practice me writing. I am a system engineer, based in the Argentina and have over 10 years of experience in IT. I started my career at the service desk, and quickly became a system administrator with help some mentors.
